channel.title: Projects on Shaan Luthra
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Shaan Luthra

item.title: Child Speech Recognition Research
item.description: Highlights: Model currently has 88% accuracy First Speech Recognition system to accurately transcribe children’s speech System is built using Signal Processing methods, Librosa, and Tensorflow During my Junior and Senior year of College I worked as a Machine Learning Researcher where I built a Speech Recognition system that is compatible with children’s voices (age 3-5). Currently, no such system exists and current speech recognition systems are only about 20% accurate with transcribing young children’s speech.

item.title: Clustering and Anomaly Detection to identify harmful log messages
item.description: This work was done as a Data Science Intern at Hewlett Packard Enterprise. I worked on the Primary Storage Customer Engineering Team. One of the most pressing concerns for our team was when customer had system failures. When this would happen, support engineers would have to spend hours of time looking through log messages to troubleshoot any error or failure. My work was to find a solution to quickly identify these harmful messages.

item.title: Predicting Tympanic Membrane Infections using Deep Learning
item.description: Highlights: Model achieved 86% test accuracy Deep Learning model built with Tensorflow From October 2020 - Feb 2021, I worked as a Machine Learning Engineer Intern at Safkan Health. Safkan is a healthcare company that is bringing to market the OtoSet. The OtoSet is a revolutionary health care solution to ear cleaning in the form of a headset. Within each OtoSet device, there will be a small camera that is able to capture an image of the inner-ear.

item.title: Swift Summarizer
item.description: Highlights: Swift Summarizer got an average of 400 page views per month while deployed Summarizer algorithm is built in pytorch using semantic embeddings Swift Summarizer is a free to use text summarizer that also finds key insights about any piece of text. For this project, I developed the entire Django Web App and all of the Machine Learning components. I was also responsible for compiling the entire system and pushing it into Production.
